channel.title: Apps on SC Nicolis homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on SC Nicolis homepage

item.description: Parameters of the model Number of individuals (\(N\)) Probability to join shelter 1 (\(\mu_1\)) Probability to join shelter 2 (\(\mu_2\)) Individual probability to leave shelter 1 (\(\theta_1\)) Individual probability to leave shelter 2 (\(\theta_2\)) Interattraction in shelter 1 (\(\alpha_1\)) Interattraction in shelter 2 (\(\alpha_2\)) Threshold value (\(K\)) Cooperativity (\(m\)) Parameters of the simulation Number of timesteps Number of simulations Show plot Show stats Show data Download data Binary choice cockroach model $$\frac{d X_i}{dt} = \mu _i\left(N - \sum_{j=1}^2 X_j\right) -\frac{\theta_i}{K^m+\left(\alpha_i X_i\right)^m}X_i \quad i=1,2$$
Number of individuals : Probability of success : Calculate probability between and Show plot
